name: Lost At Sea
content: I was a boat drifting out into sea
我是一只飞奔向大海的小船
你能看到的除了充满希望我,一无所有
我是一个脱离大陆的石子
我离你的手相隔上万英里
And in my head I heard them play a song
我听到它们在演奏一首歌
And in my head I heard them play a song
我听到它们在演奏一首歌
Where they will never find us
Got stars at night to guide us
Where they will never find us
Got stars at night to guide us
